column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: お願いします！
column4: Yes, please!

column3: 結構です
column4: No, thank you.

column3: 七宝のナイフを作る
column4: A Scimitar of the Seven.

column3: 七宝の盾を作る
column4: A Daybreaker.

column3: 両方作る！
column4: Make both!

column3: やっぱり結構です
column4: Actually, never mind.

column3: その事ですが…
column4: About that...

column3: また来ます！
column4: I'll be back!

column3: 作ってください
column4: Yes, please.

column3: やめておきます
column4: Maybe later.

column3:
その雷鳴の兜は私ですら
まだ手を触れたことのないこの国の宝…
正直 羨ましさや嫉妬の気持ちが
ないわけではない…
しかし お前は民の笑顔だけでなく
族長様の笑顔まで取り戻してくれた
私では到底できなかったことだ…

お前だからこそ族長様は
それをお預けになられたのだ
兜に何かあったら許さぬからな！
それだけは肝に銘じておけ！
column4:
That Thunder Helm is a treasure of the
Gerudo that even I have never laid
hands on... 
If I'm being honest, I do feel a twinge of
envy toward you...

But you've not only restored happiness
to our people...you've brought that
same happiness to the chief, as well.
This was a task beyond my abilities...
It only makes sense that the chief would
entrust you with such a treasured item.
Having said that, should anything happen
to that helm, I will never forgive you!
Bear that in mind!

column3:
色々あったが…
お前には本当に世話になったな
英傑の武具は雷鳴の兜に続く ゲルド族の宝
なかなか手に入らない逸品だ！
武具に何かあれば すぐに申し出るんだぞ
column4:
A lot happened, but... We are truly
indebted to you.

The Champion's arms are treasures of
the Gerudo, much like the Thunder Helm.

If anything happens to them, you must
let me know immediately.

column3:
言い訳はいい… ともかく七宝の盾を失った
…とそういうことだな
column4:
Don't bother with excuses—I can see it
in your eyes. You've lost the Daybreaker.
That's what's going on, right?

column3:
私はいつでも ここにいて
族長様をお守りしている
武器に関して何かあれば
いつでも来るといい
column4:
I am always here, protecting the chief.
Come see me anytime you have a
question about the weapons.

column3:
…それでダイヤモンドはどうした？

武器を作りたいのはわかるが
材料がないことには どうにもしてやれんな
column4:
Well? Show me the diamonds!


No amount of wishful thinking will allow
me to craft something without enough of
the proper materials.

column3:
なんだと…

七宝の盾だけでなく七宝のナイフまでも
失った… だと
column4:
Wh-what? Did you say...
You've lost not only the Daybreaker but
the Scimitar of the Seven as well?

column3:
そうなるとダイヤモンド2個"火打ち石10個に
ゲルドのナイフとゲルドの盾が必要になるが…
column4:
In that case, I'll need two diamonds, ten
pieces of flint, a Gerudo scimitar, and a
Gerudo shield.

column3:
言い訳はいい… ともかく七宝のナイフを失った
…とそういうことだな
column4:
Don't bother with excuses—I can see it
in your face. You've lost the
Scimitar of the Seven.

column3:
よし それでは素材を預からせてもらう
そこで少し待っていてくれ
column4:
OK, I'll take those materials now. Wait
here for a little bit.

column3:
…待たせたな

これが新しい七宝のナイフだ
持っていくがいい
column4:
Thanks for waiting.
This is your new Scimitar of the Seven.
Take care of it.

column3:
…待たせたな

これが新しい七宝の盾だ
持っていくがいい
column4:
Thanks for waiting.
This is your new Daybreaker.
Take care of it.

column3:
…待たせたな

これが新しい七宝のナイフと七宝の盾だ
持っていくがいい
column4:
Thanks for waiting.
Here are your new Scimitar of the Seven
and Daybreaker. Take care of them.

column3:
お前の働きは見事だった！
兵を代表し私からも礼を言わせてくれ
さあ宝箱から武具をとるといい

いくらこの国の恩人でも
族長様を お待たせしてはならぬぞ
column4:
You did amazing work!
I believe I speak for everyone when I
say thank you!
Now, go ahead and take what awaits you
in those treasure chests there.

Move quickly. We are indebted to you,
but that doesn't mean you can make the
chief wait forever.

column3:
七宝のナイフか…作るにはダイヤモンドが1個
火打ち石が5個とゲルドのナイフが必要だぞ
column4:
The Scimitar of the Seven, huh?
To make it, I'll need one diamond, five
pieces of flint, and a Gerudo scimitar.

column3:
七宝の盾か…作るにはダイヤモンドが1個
火打ち石が5個とゲルドの盾が必要だぞ
column4:
The Daybreaker, huh? To make it, I'll
need one diamond, five pieces of flint,
and a Gerudo shield.

column3:
なんだ？ 
貴重なものだと知って怖気づいたか？
しかし安心するがいい
貴重ではあるが新たに作ることはできる
ただし作るにはダイヤモンドが必要となる

必要なのはたった1個だが…
ダイヤモンドは この世界の最高級鉱石…
七宝の盾と七宝のナイフに
負けず劣らず貴重な品だ
まぁ ともかく壊さんことだな
column4:
What? Are you getting cold feet after
discovering how precious these items
are?
You can relax. Though they may be
precious, it is within my power to remake
them, if needed.
I must have a diamond in order to make
one, however. Only one diamond, but
they are the highest quality of gems...
They're just as precious as the
Daybreaker or the Scimitar of the Seven!
It's best if you just try not to break them.

column3:
まぁ いい
それでお前はどうしたいんだ？
七宝のナイフを作るにはダイヤモンドが1個 
火打ち石が5個それにゲルドのナイフが必要だ
column4:
...I suppose nothing is accomplished by
discussing it further. So what do you
want to do?
To make a Scimitar of the Seven, I'll
need one diamond, five flint, and a
Gerudo scimitar.

column3:
…まったく族長様から授かりし品を
なくすとは…
お前というやつは…
column4:
I can't believe you'd lose such a
precious item. Entrusted to you by
the chief, no less!
I shouldn't be surprised.

column3:

To make another Daybreaker, I'll need

a Gerudo shield.

column3:
…まぁ いい
あの武具は きっと主を守ったのであろう
それで新しいのを作りたいのか？
column4:
...I suppose nothing is accomplished by
discussing it further. I'm sure they
protected their master.
Well, do you want me to make new ones
for you?

column3:
困ったことがあれば
いつでもこの街に来るといい
この街の者は皆お前の味方だからな

ただし ヴォーイだということは
決して悟られぬようにな
column4:
If you ever find yourself in trouble, you
are always welcome to come here.
Everyone in this town is your ally now.
However, you still mustn't let anyone
discover that you are actually a voe.

column3:
英傑の武具は雷鳴の兜に続く ゲルド族の宝
それを手にできるハイリア人はお前ぐらいだろう
武具に何かあれば すぐに申し出るんだぞ
column4:
The Champion's arms are treasures of
the Gerudo, much like the Thunder Helm.

You are perhaps the only Hylian ever
to wield them.

If anything happens to them, you must
let me know immediately.

column3:
七宝の盾を失った…
お前はそう言いたいのか？
私をたばかるつもりか！

本当に この世から消えてしまった時に
また来るんだな
column4:
You've lost the Daybreaker?
Is that what you're trying to say?

Ha! Did you think you could deceive
me so easily?!

Take your falsehoods and go! Return to
me if it really has been lost.

Although... It does appear that you've
